problem_text_cn: 如图,△ABC中,E、F分别是AB,AC的中点,若△AEF的面积为1,则四边形EBCF的面积为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, E and F are the midpoints of AB and AC respectively. If the area of ​​△AEF is N_0, then the area of ​​the quadrilateral EBCF is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵E、F分别是AB,AC的中点,∴EF∥BC,∴△AEF∽△ABC,∴\frac{S_{\bigtriangleupAEF}}{S_{\bigtriangleupABC}}={(\frac{EF}{BC})}²={(\frac{1}{2})}²=\frac{1}{4},∵△AEF的面积为1,∴△ABC的面积是4,∴四边形EBCF的面积是4-1=3,故选:C．
raw_comment: 本题考查了相似三角形的性质和判定,三角形的中位线定理的应用,注意:相似三角形的面积比等于相似比的平方．
